mapper.sql: id, regdate, regname, regcode, filepath, filesize, videoaudio_posterpath, filetype, videoaudio_duration, width, height, longitude, latitude, location_msg, filename, year_str, month_str, day_str, slave_postfix, weekday_str,weather
mapper.select:
select
from resource_meta_data where regcode=#{regcode}
and year_str=#{yearStr},
and month_str=#{monthStr},
and day_str=#{dayStr},
and weekday_str=#{weekdayStr},
order by regdate desc ,longitude,latitude limit #{page},#{pageSize}

select
CONCAT(CONCAT(year_str,'#'),group_concat(distinct month_str order by month_str desc))YM from resource_meta_data where regcode=#{regcode} group by year_str order by year_str desc
distinct year_str Y from resource_meta_data where regcode=#{regcode} order by year_str desc
distinct month_str M from resource_meta_data where regcode=#{regcode} and year_str=#{yearStr} order by month_str desc
distinct day_str D from resource_meta_data where regcode=#{regcode} and year_str=#{yearStr} and month_str=#{monthStr} order by day_str desc
mapper.insert: insert into resource_meta_data (id, regdate, regname, regcode, filepath, filesize, videoaudio_posterpath, filetype, videoaudio_duration, width, height, longitude, latitude, location_msg, filename, year_str, month_str, day_str, slave_postfix, weekday_str, clientinfo,weather) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{regname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filesize,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{videoaudioPosterpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filetype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{videoaudioDuration,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{width,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{height,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locationMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yearStr,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{monthStr,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dayStr,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{slavePostfix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weekdayStr,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{clientinfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},#{weather,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
